title: rtgh
body: can you god damn explain me why i just lost Lp although i won the ranked game?

replies.body:
It's really hard to know which match you're talking about without any info, but if your team *won* a match and you *lost* LP it was likely because you were marked as AFK for having been inactive long enough to be considered out of the match. At that point, you will lose LP regardless of who wins since you were gone long enough for it to have made a difference in the overall match. 

Sorry for a bit of a slow reply, but this was submitted to NA boards in the middle of the night and sadly we can't work 24/7 =\ .
